QuestData.Title: The Conquest Pit: Death Is Likely
QuestData.Description: I'm gonna shoot straight with ya, kid. This next contender's a murderer.$B$BLiterally.$B$BHe was to be executed last week, but he strangled the hangman with his left hand, so Krenna's guards sort of let me have him.$B$BFeel free to pass on this one. I wouldn't blame ya.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Horgrenn Hellcleave inside the Conquest Pit and speak to Bookie Vel'jen for a reward.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bookie Vel'jen at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's not over until... well, you know the drift by now.
QuestData.RewardText: Fancy footwork, fancy footwork. You really made quick work of that crazy orc, friend.$B$BOdds were against you seven-to-one; made some nice coin on that one!
